lines.text: Look at her, and look at me... who did what to who?

[after his fake story about him and Marjorie to her roommates]
Jesus, I'm so sorry that this thing happened today. And I forgive you, Marjorie.

[Marjorie flies into a rage and attacks Joe, seeing the sheath for his knife]
What is this? What is this?

[Pat recoils in horror as Marjorie holds it up to his face]
I use it for work. I cut open boxes in the warehouse.

[menacingly]
Cut boxes, huh?
[holds it closer to Joe's face]
Cuts them good, huh? It's the kind of knife they use to gut a deer.
[She cuts the phone cord binding his hands and feet together, proving its sharpness]

[cautiously]
Wait.

[turning on Joe with his own words]
Smile.
[Joe trembles]
Smile. Nicer. Don't make your lips tight.
[slaps him hard]
Did I hurt you?
[holds knife to his throat]

[panicked]
Patty, make her stop!

[menacing]
Now, kiss me. And tell me you want to make love.

[frightened]
What?
Say it.
[hissing]
Say it.
[strikes him in the face]
Say it.
No talking to the animal!

[Pat is taking Joe out of the fireplace and helping him into a chair]
Pat, I'd be careful.

[grateful]
God bless you.

[Pat applies a washcloth and water to Joe's eye]
Oh, God... is it bad?

[Pat nods]
Am I going to go blind?
I don't know.
What?
I don't know!

[begging and obviously frightened]
Please take me to a hospital.

[Margie plunges knife into chair cushion beneath Joe's crotch]
Tell them what happened
[she yanks him to his feet]
or I'll cut them off! Tell them!
[screams]
Tell them! Tell them! Tell them!

[anguished]
I watched the house! I stole the letters!
[he falls to his knees, Marjorie grabs him by the hair and holds his knife to his throat]
And what else?

[breaking down]
I... I came here to kill you... and Patty... and Terry.
[Terry and Patty look on, horrified]
Linda Martinez, Paula Mikowski, Marie Parks...
[Marjorie runs knife across his throat, Joe screams and falls to floor, sobbing, but realizing he's not hurt]

Thank you... thank you. The first time I did it... my wife, she's reading the paper. She says 'Joe, did you fix the back door? 'Cause I don't want no raper coming in here.' And I says, 'don't worry honey, he don't want you'. And I fixed the back door real good... so that the raper don't get her. Oh, God.

[tears running down her face]
Marjorie...
Go get the police.

[Pat nods]
Oh, God.
[to Marjorie]
I'll stay. I'll stay with you.

[softly]
Go with Pat.
I'm sorry.

[Marjorie nods... they leave... she turns Joe around and guides him back to the fireplace, where he takes a fetal position... she turns on a lamp and sits down near him with a look of triumph on her face... end credits]

[after Marjorie has sprayed the insect repellent in his eyes and bound his hands, he staggers to stand]
Where are you? What did you put in my fucking eyes! Bitch. You fucking bitch, I'll kill you. I'll kill you.
[walks into kitchen, where tea kettle is whistling]
Where are you, you fucking cunt?
[Marjorie pours the hot water in his face and hits him with the kettle... he falls and she binds his feet to his wrists]
What're you doing? Where are you going?
[she runs outside to Terry's car]
Go ahead! Go ahead and call the cops! You can't prove a fucking thing! You got no witnesses! You got no cum up your snatch! You got nothing, pussy! They gotta Miranda me and let me go!

[clinching bottle and cigarette]
Maybe we should make up a story?
Do we have something to be afraid of?

[scared]
They're going to lock us all up and throw away the keys!
Shut up idiot!

[yelling]
You shut up!

[kneeling]
Marjorie, a man is badly hurt and you don't have a case.
That's why I have a hammer.
Okay. Let's talk about the hammer?
Terry,
[checking the medicine]
this isn't atropine?
Yeah, well it's a prescription drug. You need a doctor's signature.
